data.text: «Ee, wɔiti pɛgi kpɔɔle wɔin wo ma,
Leeni vaa zu wo walii lɔɔzu daamianigi ʋolu,
À woilo ga pagɔ, wo ʋa pɔ̀,
Wɛlɛ, gè tɔun kɛɛni nuɓusɛiti bɛ ga zeelei,
Ungo, ɗa zii ɠiligi loli, nii è la kwɛɛ,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ɓe siɛ ʋelei ʋa,
«Ʋelei nɔ geeɠɔlɔgi ɠaaɠoozaai la zooi ʋa,
Ʋelei tonai ta kɔɔlɛ vukɔi ti ʋuuzu la, ti zeɠe geezuʋɛ,
tama, zekaa nɔ é la ga dàawooi, é ɠulazu dà,
Ungo, wa ɠula ná ga koozunɛɛi,
Ʋɛ ɠaingi ma lɔɓɔɠɛlɛgiti ti ná, sipɛlɛ gului ɠa wuzeɠe miná,
